item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Trisha Yearwood
item.description: "What's meant to be will always find a way" -- Trisha Yearwood

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Compton Mackenzie
item.description: "Love makes the world go round? Not at all. Whiskey makes it go round twice as fast." -- Compton Mackenzie

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Joseph Morris
item.description: "I love you and it's getting worse." -- Joseph Morris

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Judy Garland
item.description: "For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul." -- Judy Garland

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Jennifer Labrecque
item.description: "Be prepared for some changes." His voice dropped. "It'll be noisy. Maybe dirty. Definitely messy. But I can guarantee you'll be satisfied when it's over." -- Jennifer Labrecque

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Lora Leigh
item.description: "You don't change what you love or you never loved it to begin with." -- Lora Leigh

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Chris Owen
item.description: "Jake wasn't about to be seduced like some schoolgirl. Not by a man who went by the unlikely name of Tornado, not by anyone. He stood as firmly as he could in the mud and tore his mouth from the kiss, staring into too dark eyes. As his hands made their way into Tor's wet jeans he said, "This doesn't mean I like you, you know." -- Chris Owen

item.title: Daisiemae add a quote by Zathyn Priest
item.description: "Oh, Cameron," Eldon replied in a whisper, moving closer and brushing his lips over Cameron's mouth. "You are literally the very reason my heart beats. Nothing I have lost can compare with the love in you I have found." -- Zathyn Priest
